title: TALES FROM THE CLENCHED BUTT

messages.body:
NO 65 ROCKEY STREET,
JOHANNESBURG,
SOUTH AFRICA.
PHONE NUMBER:-27-73-181-4872.
SIR/MADAM,

GREETINGS FROM ME TO YOU.I KNOW YOU DON'T KNOW ME. BUT PLEASE CAN
YOU BE OF ASSITANCES TO ME. I GOT YOU CONTACT ADRRESS FROM THE INTERNET
TO SEE IF YOU CAN HELP ME TO TRANSFER OUR FAMILY MONEY TO YOUR ACCOUNT
IN YOUR COUNTRY.

MY NAME IS MR IYKE MADU (JNR). I AM FROM ZIMBABWE, MY FATHER WAS
KILLED DURING THE PRESIDENT ROBERT MUGABE SIZING OF LANDS FROM THE
FARMERS, MY FATHER WAS AMONG THE FARMERS THAT WERE KILLED, BUT BEFORE
HE WAS KILLED HE WENT TO SOUTH AFRICA AND DEPOSITED THE SUM OF $15.5
MILLION DOLLARS IN A PRIVATE SECURITY COMPANY.
NOW I AM IN SOUTH AFRICA WITH MY FAMILY. PLEASE I WILL STOP
HERE, THEY IS NO NEED FOR TOO MANY STORY, I PROMISE YOU IF YOU CAN
HELP ME TO TRANSFER THIS MONEY TO YOUR COUNTRY I WILL BE GREATFULL.
YOUR PENCENTAGE WILL BE MAPPED OUT. WAITING FOR YOUR REPLY.
GOD BLESS YOU . IF YOU HAVE ANY BODY WHO CAN HELP, PLEASE. MY
PHONE NUMBER IS ON TOP, SO PLEASE DO CALL ME. YOU CAN INCLUDE YOUR
PHONE NUMBER SO THAT I CAN CALL YOU AS WELL.
YOURS FAITH FULLY,
MR IYKE MADU (JNR)

(FOR THE FAMILY)
messages.subject: ASSISTANCE FOR HELP AND MAY THE LORD BLESS YOU
messages.raw:
Date: Tue, 9 Sep 2003 09:54:43 +0100 (BST)
From: iyk madu
Subject: ASSISTANCE FOR HELP AND MAY THE LORD BLESS YOU

NO 65 ROCKEY STREET,
JOHANNESBURG,
SOUTH AFRICA.

SIR/MADAM,


GREETINGS FROM ME TO YOU.I KNOW YOU DON'T KNOW ME. BUT PLEASE CAN YOU BE OF ASSITANCES TO ME. I GOT YOU CONTACT ADRRESS FROM THE INTERNET TO SEE IF YOU CAN HELP ME TO TRANSFER OUR FAMILY MONEY TO YOUR ACCOUNT IN YOUR COUNTRY.


MY NAME IS MR IYKE MADU (JNR). I AM FROM ZIMBABWE, MY FATHER WAS KILLED DURING THE PRESIDENT ROBERT MUGABE SIZING OF LANDS FROM THE FARMERS, MY FATHER WAS AMONG THE FARMERS THAT WERE KILLED, BUT BEFORE HE WAS KILLED HE WENT TO SOUTH AFRICA AND DEPOSITED THE SUM OF $15.5 MILLION DOLLARS IN A PRIVATE SECURITY COMPANY.

NOW I AM IN SOUTH AFRICA WITH MY FAMILY. PLEASE I WILL STOP HERE, THEY IS NO NEED FOR TOO MANY STORY, I PROMISE YOU IF YOU CAN HELP ME TO TRANSFER THIS MONEY TO YOUR COUNTRY I WILL BE GREATFULL. YOUR PENCENTAGE WILL BE MAPPED OUT. WAITING FOR YOUR REPLY.

GOD BLESS YOU . IF YOU HAVE ANY BODY WHO CAN HELP, PLEASE. MY PHONE NUMBER IS ON TOP, SO PLEASE DO CALL ME. YOU CAN INCLUDE YOUR PHONE NUMBER SO THAT I CAN CALL YOU AS WELL.

YOURS FAITH FULLY,

MR IYKE MADU (JNR)


(FOR THE FAMILY)

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Madu (JNR),
Thank you for your email, which I found extremely
interesting and boring at the same time (but that's just me). I
sympathise with your plight. Robert Mugabe is indeed scum, and I
for one would like to stab that bastard 419 times in the back! My
apologies for my language Iyke, Mr. Mugabe makes me feel this way.
Anyway, I would be very happy to try to help you.
Please get back to me with your plans ASAP.
Sincerely,
Mr. Butt Clencher.
comments: [Will Iyke spot my 419 reference - I don't think so]
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: Iyke Madu

Dear Mr. Madu (JNR),

Thank you for your email, which I found extremely interesting and boring at the same time (but that's just me). I sympathise with your plight. Robert Mugabe is indeed scum, and I for one would like to stab that bastard 419 times in the back! My apologies for my language Iyke, Mr. Mugabe makes me feel this way. [Will Iyke spot my 419 reference - I don't think so]

Anyway, I would be very happy to try to help you. Please get back to me with your plans ASAP.

Sincerely,

Mr. Butt Clencher.

messages.body:
Dear Sir
Thanks for your mail and willingness to assist
me,sir the money is still in the vault where my father deposited
it,i am staying here as a refugee and have no legal right to invest
with this money here so i whant you to assist my family as our forign
partner so that we can transfer the fund into your account,sir my
family is going to offer you 30%of the total sum after the money
is transfered into your account,sir i need your telephone and fax
number for easy communication and to tell you more about the fund,kindly
send your phone number sir,you can contact me with this number 27-73-181-4872
rest is okay and hoping to hear from you.
best regards
IYKE MADU JNR
FOR THE FAMILY

best regards

IYKE MADU JNR
FOR THE FAMILY

messages.body:
Dear Brother Butt
Thanks for your mail and may the lord bless you,sir
i contacted our family attorney this morning and told him your full
willingness to assist my family transfer the moeny into your account
for investment and he promise to contact you today,sir i will like
you to come to south africa here for the transfer of this fund with
you here it will be easy to transfer the money,i pray that the almighty
God will do something new in your life and that of my family,and
i am trusting in you that you will not betray us after the money
is transfered into your account.rest is okay and hoping to hear
from you.may the lord bless you.
best regards
Iyke madu jnr
for the family.

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Madu,
Thank you for your email and I look forward to the email from your
attorney.
Actually, flying to South Africa will not be a problem as I am
about to visit some of my relatives in Nairobi, Kenya (They live
in the Westlands area of Nairobi), so it will be a short flight
to meet with you in South Africa.
Sincerely,
Butt Clencher.
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: Iyke Madu

Dear Mr. Madu,

Thank you for your email and I look forward to the email from your attorney.

Actually, flying to South Africa will not be a problem as I am about to visit some of my relatives in Nairobi, Kenya (They live in the Westlands area of Nairobi), so it will be a short flight to meet with you in South Africa.

Sincerely,

Butt Clencher.

messages.body:
Dear Brother Butt
Thanks for your mail,and may the lord bless you,
our family attorney told me this morning that he tried to contact
your number but the line is on voice massage can you please give
me your direct telephone number so that he will call you,from what
the attorney told me this morning that if you are here that the
transfer will only take two working days to transfer the fund into
your account.please my brother let this trasaction be confidential
to you alone untill the fund is transfered,i await for your urgent
reply and looking forward to see you here in south africa.rest is
okay and hoping to hear from you.
best regards
iyke madu jnr
for the family

messages.body:
Dear Iyke,
Thanks for the email.
Sorry about the phone thing. The number is actually a forwarding
number, and automatically gets switched to my answer service if
I am unavailable. I do a lot of travelling in my business and so
I am never in one location for very long. The number I quoted previously
is my direct number, but as I say if I am busy the answer phone
will automatically take the call. My apologies over this, but I
am an extremely busy man, as well as a transvestite.
Please will you confirm to me what dates you would prefer me to
travel to South Africa so that I can try to book a flight for a
suitable date and also find some nice mini skirts.
Sincerely,
Butt Clencher.
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: Iyke Madu

Dear Iyke,

Thanks for the email.

Sorry about the phone thing. The number is actually a forwarding number, and automatically gets switched to my answer service if I am unavailable. I do a lot of travelling in my business and so I am never in one location for very long. The number I quoted previously is my direct number, but as I say if I am busy the answer phone will automatically take the call. My apologies over this, but I am an extremely busy man, as well as a transvestite.

Please will you confirm to me what dates you would prefer me to travel to South Africa so that I can try to book a flight for a suitable date and also find some nice mini skirts.

Sincerely,

Butt Clencher.

messages.body:
OUR REF:RSA/NAJ/JP/O3/1864
YOUR REF:N/A
DATE:15/09/2003
FROM;BARR JABULANI NDLOVU
Dear Sir,
SUBJECT:Legal confirmation of transaction procedure.
We received your information requesting for the procedure of
the transaction between you a partner of the fisrt party and your
partner of the second party,Mr Iyke Madu. However,you have to realise
that you are to play a crucial role in this transaction due to your
partners refugee status which limits him from certain financial
rights in line with international charter on refugees.
subsequently,we do forward to you the details of the procedure.
1.you have to raise a power of attorney empowering this honourable
chambers to represent you in every stage of the transaction as your
legal representative upon your arrival here
2..a non-resident bank account will be opened in your name where
this fund will be deposited before onward transfer to your nominated
bank accoun
3..A photocopy of your international passport ,or driving lisence
we therefore require you to forward to us your business profile
and the investment plan you have for this fund at the completion
of the transfer process. we shall also require a reasonable guarrantee
from you as to the safety of this fund in your bank account.Do you
think that your nominated bank account can accommodate this fund?
Moreso,the above processes require fund and logistics to realise
which you shall participate for its realisation.
Meanwhile,considering the bills accruing to this consignment
at the security company we do appreciate that you arrive South Africa
within the shortest possible time as a meeting here is very relevant.Do
send a copy of your international passport to enable us make a hotel
reservation for you upon your confirmation of your arrival date.
However,we shall proceed to the security company as to what
is required from you in realising the afore mentioned transaction.Feel
free to call our 24Hrs tel line on +27-83-947-3929 for further clearification.
we shall start our legal services towards you upon your compliance
to this legal request.
waiting for your quick response
Barr JABULANI NDLOVU(LLB,HONS.BL)
PRINCIPAL ATTORNEY IN CHARGE
messages.subject: LEGAL CONFIRMATION OF TRANSACTION PROCEDURE

DATE:15/09/2003

TO:MR BUTT CLENCHER

FROM;BARR JABULANI NDLOVU

Dear Sir,

SUBJECT:Legal confirmation of transaction procedure.

We received your information requesting for the procedure of the transaction between you a partner of the fisrt party and your partner of the second party,Mr Iyke Madu. However,you have to realise that you are to play a crucial role in this transaction due to your partners refugee status which limits him from certain financial rights in line with international charter on refugees.

subsequently,we do forward to you the details of the procedure.

1.you have to raise a power of attorney empowering this honourable chambers to represent you in every stage of the transaction as your legal representative upon your arrival here

2..a non-resident bank account will be opened in your name where this fund will be deposited before onward transfer to your nominated bank accoun

3..A photocopy of your international passport ,or driving lisence

we therefore require you to forward to us your business profile and the investment plan you have for this fund at the completion of the transfer process. we shall also require a reasonable guarrantee from you as to the safety of this fund in your bank account.Do you think that your nominated bank account can accommodate this fund?

Moreso,the above processes require fund and logistics to realise which you shall participate for its realisation.

Meanwhile,considering the bills accruing to this consignment at the security company we do appreciate that you arrive South Africa within the shortest possible time as a meeting here is very relevant.Do send a copy of your international passport to enable us make a hotel reservation for you upon your confirmation of your arrival date.

However,we shall proceed to the security company as to what is required from you in realising the afore mentioned transaction.Feel free to call our 24Hrs tel line on +27-83-947-3929 for further clearification.

we shall start our legal services towards you upon your compliance to this legal request.

waiting for your quick response

Barr JABULANI NDLOVU(LLB,HONS.BL)

PRINCIPAL ATTORNEY IN CHARGE

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Madu,
Mr. Ndlovu contacted me by email today, and I have sent him the
details he requested.
I will book my flight shortly and then email you the flight details
so that you can get a hotel room booked for me. If at all possible,
I would be grateful for a list of local brothels in your area.
Sincerely,
Mr. Butt Clencher.
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: Iyke Madu

Dear Mr. Madu,

Mr. Ndlovu contacted me by email today, and I have sent him the details he requested.

I will book my flight shortly and then email you the flight details so that you can get a hotel room booked for me. If at all possible, I would be grateful for a list of local brothels in your area.

Sincerely,

Mr. Butt Clencher.

messages.body:
Dear Iyke,

Please find attached my booking receipt. I have forward this, along
with my requested details to JABULANI NDLOVU.
I am afraid the earliest flight that I could get was
the 24th of September, I hope this is acceptable.

I would appreciate it if you could go ahead and book the hotel for
me. I will be there for four days. Please book the room for me and
forward me the booking receipt for the hotel.

Please will you let me know if there are any processing fees that
may be required for the release of the funds? If there are, I would
appreciate it if you could advise me on the sum that may be required
so I can be sure to bring the right amount of cash.

Sincerely,

Mr. Butt Clencher.
PS: Still waiting for the brothel info.

From: Mr. Butt Clencher

I would appreciate it if you could go ahead and book the hotel for me. I will be there for four days. Please book the room for me and forward me the booking receipt for the hotel.

Please will you let me know if there are any processing fees that may be required for the release of the funds? If there are, I would appreciate it if you could advise me on the sum that may be required so I can be sure to bring the right amount of cash.

Sincerely,

Mr. Butt Clencher.

PS: Still waiting for the brothel info.

Butt Clencher's flight details.

YOUR REF:N/A
DATE:16/09/2003
FROM:ATTY JABULANI NDLOVU

DEAR SIR,

SUBJECT:YOUR TRAVEL DETAILS

We received your mail and have discussed with your partner as to
the information of your flight.
However,a copy of your flight ticket is not clear
from the attachment.We shall require you to forward relevant information
like the airline,arrival date and time,etc to enable us make the
reservation and fax a copy of the reservation to you.
We shall proceed to the security company for details
of the outstanding bills accrued to the consignment and the legal
requirements for fund release.
Your quick response awaited

Best regards

Atty Jabulani Ndlovu

principal attorney in charge
NB: we will tell you about brothel when you arrive

messages.body:
Dear Sir,
For your clarification, the details are as follows:
Leave HEATHROW (United Kingdom) Wednesday 25th September
at 19:30 hours FLIGHT No. BA 0055
Arrive JOHANNESBURG Thursday 26th September at 07:20 hours. FLIGHT
No. BA 0055

Depart JOHANNESBURG Tuesday 28th October 05:25 hours. FLIGHT No.
BA 0056
The reason my leaving date is so long after my arrival
date is because after our meeting I am going to take an internal
flight to Nairobi, Kenya to visit some of my relatives who live
there. I will then return to Johannesburg to take my BA flight back
home (I have mentioned this previously).

Please note that I am used to staying in the Hilton hotel when on
my travels, so if possible I would require a room to be booked in
your nearest Hilton hotel (1 night should be enough as I am hoping
our meeting will be over quite quickly and get to the local brothels).
I will require booking verification before I travel.

I would appreciate it if you would be able to calculate the total
amount of cash you require from me. I am aware that there may be
other fees required for document processing etc, and I would like
to be able to bring the correct amount.

Sincerely,
Butt Clencher
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: J. Ndlovu

Dear Sir,

For your clarification, the details are as follows:

Leave HEATHROW (United Kingdom) Wednesday 25th September at 19:30 hours FLIGHT No. BA 0055
Arrive JOHANNESBURG Thursday 26th September at 07:20 hours. FLIGHT No. BA 0055

Depart JOHANNESBURG Tuesday 28th October 05:25 hours. FLIGHT No. BA 0056

The reason my leaving date is so long after my arrival date is because after our meeting I am going to take an internal flight to Nairobi, Kenya to visit some of my relatives who live there. I will then return to Johannesburg to take my BA flight back home (I have mentioned this previously).

Please note that I am used to staying in the Hilton hotel when on my travels, so if possible I would require a room to be booked in your nearest Hilton hotel (1 night should be enough as I am hoping our meeting will be over quite quickly and get to the local brothels). I will require booking verification before I travel.

I would appreciate it if you would be able to calculate the total amount of cash you require from me. I am aware that there may be other fees required for document processing etc, and I would like to be able to bring the correct amount.

Sincerely,

Butt Clencher

messages.body:
OUR REF:RSA/NAJ/JP/03/2043
YOUR REF:N/A
DATE:17/09/2003
FROM:ATTY JABULANI NDLOVU
DEAR SIR,
SUBJECT:THE COST OF THE TRANSACTION.
Having understood the nature of this transaction and our intention
to effect a legitimate transaction,we have had meetings with the
attorney of the security company as to the requirements.we have
also had discussion with some bankers as to a sucessful transaction.
Find below the details of the expenses
Beneficiary changes in your name-----------------US$2,500.00
Handling charges of the security company----------US$1,800.00
Oustanding bill for four months@US$3200 per month----------US$12,800.00
opening of th NRD account/exiting account signatory--------US$200
Vat on consignment-----------------------------------------------6,200.00
Total expenses due--------------------------US$23,500.00
We respectfully urge you to assist in this regard bearing in
mind that this expenses is subject to refund after retrieving this
fund from the security company.We can forward the trust account
of the security company fort you to transfer the fund prior to your
arrival here if you will not be comfortable to come along with it.
We shall forward a copy of your hotel reservation to you but
not in hilton as you have requested but in a hotel within our residential
area for easy access to you.

Waiting for your quick response
Best regards
Atty Jabulani Ndlovu(LLB,wits.BL)
principal attorney in charge

messages.body:
Dear Sir,
Thank you for informing me of the total cost of the complete processing.
Considering the amount which will be freed by this payment, the
charge seems fair. I would prefer to bring the total amount in cash,
as I am sure this would help to facilitate quicker processing, and
cash always impresses the womenfolk. I do not want to stay in S.A.
for any longer than is necessary, as I have heard it is a bit of
a hellhole. I run my own business, and I need to get back to it
ASAP.
One final thing; please would you tell me your location in Johannesburg
so that I may plan my travel itinerary correctly?
Sincerely,
Mr. Butt Clencher.
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: J. Ndlovu

Dear Sir,

Thank you for informing me of the total cost of the complete processing. Considering the amount which will be freed by this payment, the charge seems fair. I would prefer to bring the total amount in cash, as I am sure this would help to facilitate quicker processing, and cash always impresses the womenfolk. I do not want to stay in S.A. for any longer than is necessary, as I have heard it is a bit of a hellhole. I run my own business, and I need to get back to it ASAP.

One final thing; please would you tell me your location in Johannesburg so that I may plan my travel itinerary correctly?

Sincerely,

Mr. Butt Clencher.

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Madu,
It seems my request for the hotel of my choice to be booked before
I arrive is being refused. I have been very accepting up until now,
even going so far as to book my flight to you (a my expense of US
$1,800 Dollars AND withdraw $23,500.00 in cash). It seems your contacts
do not know how to operate in a courteous and businesslike way,
therefore I will cancel my flight in the morning and end the deal
here and now.
I wish you luck finding another partner.
Sincere regards,
Mr. Butt Clencher.
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: Iyke Madu

Dear Mr. Madu,

It seems my request for the hotel of my choice to be booked before I arrive is being refused. I have been very accepting up until now, even going so far as to book my flight to you (a my expense of US $1,800 Dollars AND withdraw $23,500.00 in cash). It seems your contacts do not know how to operate in a courteous and businesslike way, therefore I will cancel my flight in the morning and end the deal here and now.

I wish you luck finding another partner.

Sincere regards,

Mr. Butt Clencher.

Dear Brother Butt
How are you doing to today? I am really sorry for not have
been able to contact you since this few days my mother was sick
in the hospital and I was there to take care of her she was discharge
this morning and she is fine now, sir do not cancel the flight schedule
for every arrangement have been made already proceed on coming,
the attorney told me that he is going to book the hotel reservation
for you where you directed him to book for you.
As you can see sir I am refugee here and have limited right
to do certain things on my own I believe he is going to fax you
the reservation today or by Monday, sir you can contact the attorney
and ask him why he has not fax you the hotel reservation but I believe
that he’s going to fax it today, my mom extends her regards
to you and your family’s.we hope to see you here in south africa
Best regards
Iyke madu jnr
For the family

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Madu and also Attorney Jabulani Ndlovu (I
have sent this email to both of you, but you are probably partners
or one and the same person).
By now you may probably have guessed that I am not on the flight.
My apologies.
You see, from your very first email I knew that you were in fact
a 4-1-9 scammer, and all you wanted to do was steal my hard earned
money. Of course I know that there is no $15.5 million Dollars.
I know that Iyke Madu/Jabulani Ndlovu are probably not your real
names.
I know that you were waiting for me to arrive in Johannesburg ready
to steal my money from me. You are thieves and scammers, that is
the truth. You see Iyke, all the pictures that I sent to you were
false. My name is not Butt Clencher. Butt Clencher is in fact a
joke name. Butt is a shorthand version of the word bottom.
The passport I sent to you is 100% false. The picture is not me!
In fact, the picture on the passport is in fact a British movie
star called Hugh Grant. Please use a search engine and enter in
the name, and you will find out all about him.
Thank you for going to the trouble of booking the hotel. Your time
was completely wasted, and also, I hope you wasted some of your
own money too. How does it feel to be a mugu this time? Not very
nice is it?!
Cheers,
Shiver Metimbers
messages.raw:
From: Mr. Butt Clencher
To: iyke_madu

Dear Mr. Madu and also Attorney Jabulani Ndlovu (I have sent this email to both of you, but you are probably partners or one and the same person).

By now you may probably have guessed that I am not on the flight. My apologies.

You see, from your very first email I knew that you were in fact a 4-1-9 scammer, and all you wanted to do was steal my hard earned money. Of course I know that there is no $15.5 million Dollars. I know that Iyke Madu/Jabulani Ndlovu are probably not your real names.

I know that you were waiting for me to arrive in Johannesburg ready to steal my money from me. You are thieves and scammers, that is the truth. You see Iyke, all the pictures that I sent to you were false. My name is not Butt Clencher. Butt Clencher is in fact a joke name. Butt is a shorthand version of the word bottom.

The passport I sent to you is 100% false. The picture is not me! In fact, the picture on the passport is in fact a British movie star called Hugh Grant. Please use a search engine and enter in the name, and you will find out all about him.

Thank you for going to the trouble of booking the hotel. Your time was completely wasted, and also, I hope you wasted some of your own money too. How does it feel to be a mugu this time? Not very nice is it?!

Cheers,

Shiver Metimbers

 

END.

 

A note from the webmaster

notes: I checked the booking number with the Hilton's online booking page, but the number was not accepted, so I emailed the Hiton Hotel booking department, and here's the reply I received:

[I have to mention at this point that at the time of this email I had a minor family crisis going on, so I had to shut down this baiting session quickly. Pity, became I'm sure Iyke would be great for messing about with a lot more]
[The day of my arrival, erm, arrives, and surprise surprise, I'm not there!]
[Need to get rid of Iyke now. No time to waste]
